actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: To amend vaccine injury compensation portion of the Public Health Service Act to permit a petition for compensation to be submitted within 48 months of the first symptoms of injury.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to permit a petition for vaccine injury compensation to be submitted within 48 (currently, 36) months of the first symptom or manifestation of onset, or of the significant aggravation, of injury.

titles.title: To amend vaccine injury compensation portion of the Public Health Service Act to permit a petition for compensation to be submitted within 48 months of the first symptoms of injury.
